description: Berlin straddles the banks of the Spree, which flows into the Havel (a tributary of the Elbe) in the western borough.
Delhi, is a city and a union territory of India containing New Delhi, the capital of India.[17][18] Located on the Yamuna river.
The City of London is a city, ceremonial county and local government district that contains the historic centre and the primary.
Cuba City is a city partly in Grant County and partly in Lafayette County in the U.S. state of Wisconsin. The population 2010 census.
Rome is the capital city of Italy. It is also the capital of the Lazio region, the centre of the Metropolitan City of Rome.
Dubai Dubayy Gulf Arabic is the most populous city in the United Arab Emirates (UAE) and the capital of the Emirate of Dubai.
